title: About Curiobox
subtitle: Monthly discovery boxes that grow with your child's curiosity!
description: Curiobox is a fun and educational platform specially designed for kids. We provide creative and engaging boxes filled with hands-on activities, learning tools, and fun experiments that help children explore, imagine, and grow their knowledge in exciting ways.
mission: Our mission is to nurture curiosity, creativity, and learning in children through playful and meaningful experiences.
vision: To become a trusted learning companion for every child by offering safe, smart, and joyful discovery boxes.
features: Kid-friendly curious boxes for different age groups
Secure login for families with Google or Email
